reviews.text: Hands down, Windward is my favorite dining experience in Columbus. They don't give a rat's a** about this review, either, which just makes me love it even...

Omg I just love this place! Thought this restaurant was a Chinese retail store where you find Chinese throwing stars and swords

This place hasn't changed...
get the prime-rib!! . get the oysters remick!!! get here early!! ok but seriously what a amazing place.
